General.Name: Grandjoy Holdings Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Grandjoy Holdings Group Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate development in China and internationally. The company develops residential, commercial, and industrial properties, such as office buildings, hotels, and long-renting apartments. It is also involved in the investment and development of hotels and leisure resorts. The company was formerly known as COFCO Property Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Grandjoy Holdings Group Co., Ltd. in March 2019. Grandjoy Holdings Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Beijing, China.

2.Name: Ms. Bingxin  Song
2.Title: Gen. Counsel & Sec. of the Board of Directors
